parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if client has Notepad enabled.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''shownPad'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[shownPad]]) [[then]] {[[hint]] "You have Notepad enabled."};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[shownMap]], [[shownGPS]], [[shownWatch]], [[shownCompass]], [[shownUAVFeed]]
</value></part></template>
